room_title: Escape room "The Heist Part 1" by The Puzzle Parlour in White Plains
review: The five of us did the Heist room. It was challenging and creative. Can’t wait to do more rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Heist Part 1" by The Puzzle Parlour in White Plains
review: My family did “The Heist” challenge today and we had such a great time! This was such a great room escape - very immersive, challenging but not impossible, and so cool! This was seriously a high-quality adventure. Highly recommend this if you are looking for an amazing room escape experience. Can’t wait until they have more experiences to try!

room_title: Escape room "The Heist Part 1" by The Puzzle Parlour in White Plains
review: It was our first time doing an escape room and we chose the Heist. We went for my 40th birthday and decided to dress in all black to go with the theme of the escape room. It made us use our brain lol but must of all we worked together as a team. The staff was excellent! The location was easy to find. I definitely recommend EVERYONE to go and enjoy the experience!

room_title: Escape room "The Heist Part 1" by The Puzzle Parlour in White Plains
review: My wife, two friends and myself went today and really loved it. We did the Heist and the puzzles were just hard enough to make it fun but not impossible feeling. Our was very attentive. Their clue detail and guidance really made it a great experience. I didn't expect to enjoy it as much as we did. My wife has been to an escape room in NJ and wasn't impressed but loved this. Luckily we're local and we're going to go back for their other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Heist Part 1" by The Puzzle Parlour in White Plains
review: I absolutely love this place! My wife and I have done many escape the room games and Puzzle Parlour is the best we've done. So far we've done Surgery and Heist. We will definitely be back for the other rooms. Employees are amazing and friendly as well. Thank you guys for the awesome games!
